metadata.title: CVE-2014-7189 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: crpyto/tls in Go 1.1 before 1.3.2, when SessionTicketsDisabled is enabled,allows man-in-the-middle attackers to spoof clients via unspecifiedvectors.

criterions.comment: golang: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
